documents.document: The fast track security queue in the airport was longer than the normal security queue and I think that’s beautiful.

@tangeriona I would highly recommend lessons as an adult. You’ll be amazed how quickly you can get back into it.

@tangeriona Nope - I have been to lessons as a kid. Did up to grade 3 then stopped but continued to play a bit and progress a bit until now. I do my lessons in Walton’s. They’re happy for u to be at whatever level and progress to whatever goal.
